overview: Set in the near future, 'the Intersection' journeys from a violent present to a cooperative future. Telling stories of active hope from those who have fought to reimagine extractive technology, to serve community, support nature, and value planetary relationships.  It is commissioned by Eshanthi Ranasinghe, Julia Solano and Nicole Allred, Exploration & Future Sensing, Omidyar Network, and is conceived and produced by Superflux 2021.
title: The Intersection
